sqlMap.statement:
SELECT CHNLMDIADSTCD AS "CHNLMDIADSTCD", SUM(1DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM1", SUM(1DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM1", SUM(1DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL1", SUM(2DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM2", SUM(2DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM2", SUM(2DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL2", SUM(3DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM3", SUM(3DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM3", SUM(3DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL3", SUM(4DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM4", SUM(4DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM4", SUM(4DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL4", SUM(5DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM5", SUM(5DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM5", SUM(5DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL5", SUM(6DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM6", SUM(6DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM6", SUM(6DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL6", SUM(7DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM7", SUM(7DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM7", SUM(7DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL7", SUM(8DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM8", SUM(8DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM8", SUM(8DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL8", SUM(9DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM9", SUM(9DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM9", SUM(9DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL9", SUM(10DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM10", SUM(10DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM10", SUM(10DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL10", SUM(11DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM11", SUM(11DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM11", SUM(11DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL11", SUM(12DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM12", SUM(12DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM12", SUM(12DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL12", SUM(13DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM13", SUM(13DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM13", SUM(13DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL13", SUM(14DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM14", SUM(14DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM14", SUM(14DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL14", SUM(15DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM15", SUM(15DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM15", SUM(15DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL15", SUM(16DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM16", SUM(16DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM16", SUM(16DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL16", SUM(17DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM17", SUM(17DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM17", SUM(17DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL17", SUM(18DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM18", SUM(18DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM18", SUM(18DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL18", SUM(19DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM19", SUM(19DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM19", SUM(19DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL19", SUM(20DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM20", SUM(20DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM20", SUM(20DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL20", SUM(21DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM21", SUM(21DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM21", SUM(21DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL21", SUM(22DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM22", SUM(22DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM22", SUM(22DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL22", SUM(23DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM23", SUM(23DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM23", SUM(23DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL23", SUM(24DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM24", SUM(24DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM24", SUM(24DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL24", SUM(25DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM25", SUM(25DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM25", SUM(25DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL25", SUM(26DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM26", SUM(26DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM26", SUM(26DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL26", SUM(27DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM27", SUM(27DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM27", SUM(27DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL27", SUM(28DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM28", SUM(28DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM28", SUM(28DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL28", SUM(29DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM29", SUM(29DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM29", SUM(29DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL29", SUM(30DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM30", SUM(30DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM30", SUM(30DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL30", SUM(31DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM31", SUM(31DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM31", SUM(31DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL31" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST03 WHERE STATCYM BETWEEN #startDate# AND #endDate#
TRIM(CHNLMDIADSTCD) LIKE CONCAT( '%', CONCAT(#chnlMdiaDstcd#, '%'))
GROUP BY CHNLMDIADSTCD ORDER BY CHNLMDIADSTCD
